name: Loneliness
title: Loneliness
description: Determination of whether the person is experiencing feelings of loneliness (Business ID: Entry 2200728)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Loneliness.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an determination of whether the person is experiencing feelings of loneliness.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes GROUP codes for Loneliness.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Loneliness.)
